Comparing numbers, it looks like your model is just scaled up by a factor of 10. Perhaps some millimeter-centimeter mixup somewhere.

GordonW:

Perhaps some millimeter-centimeter mixup somewhere.

STL files don‚Äôt include units in the format, so she could have imported it using centimeters when the file (like most STLs) was generated using milimeters.

@alexis_texis

Updated the website to specify the correct file to use. You‚Äôll want to use the STP file for CAD work. STL is meant for 3D modeling / 3D printing.
